short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide annoying UI elements from Twitter / X

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*FEATURES*
- Hide annoying UI elements from Twitter / X
- Always up to date
    - When Twitter / X changes their UI we can ship updates instantly!
- Want to hide other elements?
    - You can create custom toggle options with our embedded CSS editor!


Source code: https://github.com/Kenny1291/cleaner-twitter
